properties.name: Lateral Movement Risk - Role Chain Length

alertDetailsOverride.alertnameFormat: Alert from Authomize - Account can elevate privileges by assuming a role
alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: Account can elevate privileges by assuming a role. The policy detects chains of more than 3 roles in the account, this is a misconfiguration that can enable lateral movement.

properties.description: The policy detects chains of more than 3 roles in the account, this is a misconfiguration that can enable lateral movement.
properties.query:
Authomize_v2_CL
| where ingestion_time() >= ago(30m)
| extend EventID = id_s, Policy = policy_name_s, Severity = severity_s,Description = description_s,Recommendation = recommendation_s,URL = url_s,Tactics = tactics_s
| where Policy has "Chain of 3 or more roles"
| project  EventID, Policy, Severity, Description, Recommendation, URL, Category, Tactics
